thread.title: BGW
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by BGW

author: BGW
title: BGW
text: The Norrona Lofoten Gore-Tex Pro Pants seem to be assembled with exceptional craftsmanship. I have only used them for about a week, but I have only good things to say. I imagine that the thick goretex material will make for a very durable life to these snow pants. The size medium fit me (5'11" 165 lbs) very well. I love the amount and placement of the pockets on the pants. Just with the bib pocket was big enough to fit a smartphone. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase.
